Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Provides for the operation of a youth services unit within the port authority police department
Summary: Provides for the operation of a youth services unit within the port authority police department tasked with aiding youths in danger of exploitation.
LawSection: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
LawCode: Add Art VII-F, ยง1 of Chap 154 of 1921
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 154 of the laws of 1921, relating to the port authority of New York and New Jersey, in relation to the operation of a youth services unit within the port authority police department
